Key Match Events: Rasethuntsa scored for Lesotho in the 53rd minute
Babicka scored for Gabon in the 55th minute
Junior Effaghe scored for Gabon in the 84th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Lesotho will be hoping to pick up their first win in Group B on Tuesday at Moses Mabhida Stadium
Lesotho are last in fourth place with one point and drew 0-0 with Gabon last time out
Gabon are second with four points and currently occupy one of the group's two qualification spots
Lesotho managed to earn their first point of their qualifying campaign against Gabon after defending brilliantly in Friday's match
Lesotho's boss Leslie Notsi has the task of trying to qualify Likuena for their first AFCON tournament in their history
Gabon began their qualifying campaign with a 4-1 defeat against Morocco
Gabon then beat Central African Republic 2-0
Manager Thierry Mouyouma was appointed in late 2023 and has led his side to two wins in their last four games
